Original Html String

<table class="basic"><thead><tr><td>Column 1</td><td>Column 2</td></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Hello</td><td>World</td></tr></tbody></table>

Modified Html String

<table class="basic"><thead><tr><td>Column 1</td><td>Column 2</td></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Hello</td><td>Universe</td></tr></tbody></table>

Result

Column 1Column 2
HelloWorldUniverse
